title: Senki Zesshou Symphogear XV: Senki Zesshou Shinai Symphogear
alternative_title: Symphogear XV Specials, Senki Zesshoushinai Symphogear XV, 戦姫絶唱シンフォギアXV 戦姫絶唱しないシンフォギア
description: Original short episodes featuring characters in super-deformed style. Bundled with Blu-ray/DVD volumes 3 to 6 of the anime.
